fields.label: Transparent Header
fields.name: transparent_header
fields.instructions: Remove the header background to display header as part of first/hero block.

sub_fields.message: In addition to the video, you must upload an image to use as fallback while the video loads or in the case that the video doesn't load or the page is being viewed on mobile.

sub_fields.label: Opacity
sub_fields.name: opacity
sub_fields.instructions: 0-1 (eg. 0 for no opacity, 0.5 for half opacity, 1 for full opacity)

sub_fields.label: Custom Height
sub_fields.name: height_custom
sub_fields.instructions: This will be the minimum height. Eg. 500px or 50vh (50% of screen height)

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: Give this section a unique ID to use for anchor linking. For example, a section with a unique ID "my-section" can be anchor linked to via #my-section or yoursite.com/your-url/#my-section

sub_fields.label: Custom Height
sub_fields.name: column_custom_height
sub_fields.instructions: This will be the minimum height. Eg. 500px or 50vh (50% of screen height)

sub_fields.label: Reverse Stacking
sub_fields.name: reverse_stacking
sub_fields.instructions: Stack the the right column first on mobile.

sub_fields.label: Show background image of empty columns
sub_fields.name: show_background_image_of_empty_columns

sub_fields.label: Columns per row
sub_fields.name: columns_per_row
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the number of columns to show per row then click "Add Column" to add more columns

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: accordion_item
sub_fields.instructions: If organizing the accordion items into categories, put the category name into the 'Category' field and use the 'Add Category' button to add more categories and category items. Otherwise, leave the first 'Category' field blank and use only the 'Add Item' button.

fields.label: Show tagline in header
fields.name: lp_s_tagline
fields.instructions: Go to Settings > General to update tagline.

fields.label: Typography
fields.name: lp_s_type
fields.instructions: Visit https://fonts.google.com for easier viewing of font selection.

fields.message: Shortcodes [breadcrumb] - Display breadcrumb [searchform] - Display search form [year] - Display current year [pull-singles] - Display blog posts See documentation on how to customize query. Other customizations (default values show): show-featured-image="true" title-class="h4" more-cta="Read more" more-cta-class="cta" show-excerpt="true" truncate-excerpt=100 excerpt-more="…" Gravityform Classes Display form on one row - use gf-one-line class Form won't show in footer - remove quotes from shortcode
For more Wordpress customization, go to Appearance > Customize

sub_fields.label: Anchor Link
sub_fields.name: anchor_link
sub_fields.instructions: Make sure this matches the anchor link in its respective section
